name: Abdul-Basir Muhtaram
story: Jabr Khalili grew up in a small village in Iran. He joined the Iranian military at a young age, serving as a baker in the army. After his service was over, he struggled to find work and eventually joined a mercenary group. When that group disbanded, he found his way to the OPFOR faction in Arma 3. Although he misses his family, he is dedicated to his role as an Ammo Bearer and hopes to make a name for himself within the faction.
